name: Free Flag!
Did you read the rules?
description:
If you have read all our rules on the discord server carefully then you can prove it with a SHA1 hash of the 10th rule (from start to end including the number). 

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

https://discord.gg/yeeVr3N3hv

Author: SMU Whitehat Society

name: If you know, you know
Criminal
Covid Vaccination
description:
Welcome to EIS clinic!
Access http://challenge2.whitehacks.whitehats.live:9001 to make your appointment!
Note that strict measures have been implemented to adhere to company's password policy.

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Ensign

name: Employee Information Heist
description:
Oliver, a new employee at your company, has implemented an Azure AD authentication system on the company website that he claims is very secure. 

As the HR manager, you've accidentally forgotten to input Oliver's job title into the HR system when he onboarded and don't want to ask him directly. Can you find a way to retrieve this information using the new authentication system? 

Remember, Oliver thinks that no one will be able to find out anything about the company through this system, so you'll need to be clever and resourceful in order to succeed.

Could you help us to find out his job title?

Do not pentest the website. You only need Google and might need a programming language.

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Milton

name: CyberBuzz
Cyber Punks
Who's my favourite pokemon?
I can't find my friend!
Hidden Treasure
description:
You have received an encrypted email containing your invitation to Whitehacks 2023. 

However, your email was hijacked by some cyber punks, who tried to uncover the hidden flag within your invitation but failed, so they disfigured your invitation instead!

Can you retrieve the flag within?

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: xbowery

name: Zip? Unzip?
description:
I was given this zip file. I know I'm supposed to find a flag, but where is it?

Hint: look out for hints!

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Zara Teo

name: Cyber Shef
Block Ciphering
description:
In symmetric encryption block ciphering, there are three modes of encryption:

* ECB: Electronic Code Book
* CBC: Cipher Block Chaining
* CTR: Counter

We will be using the Cipher Block Chaining.

Mapping of before and after is included in the attachment.

Give a plaintext binary return the encrypted binary using CBC mode.

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Jingkai

name: Too Slow
description:
I've made a binary that prints the flag for you! 

Too bad you'll only get it after the CTF ends.

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Jared

name: BeepBeepBoopBoop
description:
I keep hearing this sound, but I can't figure out what it is. Can you help me?

The flag should be in all uppercase.

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Zara Teo

name: Spy x Whitehats
description:
I was snooping on a discussion about Whitehacks. I think they were even discussing a flag!

Can you help me find it?

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Chloe

name: DinnerEatWhat
description:
My chef wanted to cook dinner but he is nowhere to be found. I remember him telling me about Playfair cipher yesterday while we were playing dota. I also remember him telling me that he always uses playsmart as the cipher key to communicate with his wife.

Maybe you could help me to find where did he put the recipe and whats for dinner?

password: whitehacks

The flag will be in the format WH2023{flag}.

Author: Zheng Da

name: GrindPunk
description:
You need to help V find the most reward within the allocated time to get all the upgrades he needs before his fight with Adam Smasher.

You will be given the maximum time and a list of tuples containing 2 integers, the first being the Eddies awarded for completing the mission, and the second being the amount of time required to complete it.

Input the most number of Eddies that V can accumulate before the time runs out.

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Ryan Loh (mrchoc)

name: Wardialer
description:
It appears that V has managed to get hold of a high ranking Arasaka Corporation employee's cell phone. Additionally, he has stolen a state-of-the-art computer program specially built for Corpo espionage straight out of Arasaka's Security division. With a phone number, this program is able to dial it and exfiltrate a list of contacts on that phone. With a single employee's phone, you can exfiltrate their boss's phone number, and from their boss, their boss's boss's phone number, and so on.

It is urgent that V finds out the phone number of Saburo Arasaka, the head of the Arasaka Corporation. To do so, you will have to climb the network from employee to employee, all the way to the top. Can you help V?

The number of the cell phone V retrieved: `133713879102`

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Samuel Tan

name: Poker
description:
Let's play Poker! I'll give you an advantage by letting you draw the first five cards first.

With that, can you figure out the rest of the deck?

Access the server: nc host port

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Milton

name: Calculator App
description:
Look at my calculator application! It does math well.
But does it also allow other commands to be run?
How do I get past the filters?
Maybe I need to chain them up.

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Ensign

name: Final Message
description:
Johnny Silverhand, the man himself, has sent you 2 messages, but the second one seems to be messed up... 

This is of vital importance. We have not heard back from him since then. 

We need to know what his final message was.

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Samuel Tan

name: The Forgotten Keys
description:
You've found a set of keys under the carpet of your friend's house on Christmas day. A note accompanied the keys, reading: ""Seek, and you shall find. The access key is incomplete. Only I remember the last three characters."" It seems that only the access key is incomplete, while the secret key is complete. Can you figure out what these keys unlock, and what you can do with them?

Note: Only the access key is incomplete. The secret key is complete.

Access Key: AKIAURMRS6OY3TSIS
Secret Key: t2gYzB4M6tF9cvV0vbs1oyO3owE9gYwXtk4UtOo2

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Milton

name: mem kopi
Dumpling Cookbook
description:
Dumpling Cookbook! I can take your dumpling order in this website! Then I'll send you your cooked dumpling in 3-5 business days. In the mean time you can take a look at the sample dumpling pictures I created for you. Let me know if you like the way it looks. 

Note: Not responsible for any food poisoning that may or may not happen.

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Ensign

Alternative Connection: http://challenge2.whitehacks.whitehats.live:5002

name: Serial Forger
WhiteHacked
D-Cereal App
Trauma Team
description:
Welcome to the Trauma Team. As part of our platinum package, we pride ourselves in being able to reach our patients in under 10 seconds, no matter how far away they are. Can you help us with this guarantee?

NOTE 1: The given map is represented as a 2D array of characters.
0 - Empty (You can move onto these cells)
X - Wall (You can NOT move onto these cells)
T - Trauma Team (You)
P - Patient (Target)

NOTE 2: This challenge expects the shortest sequence of moves as an answer. Please submit your answer as a sequence of moves represented by 1 character per move as shown below.
U - Up
D - Down
L - Left
R - Right
Sample Answer: `UURRD`

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Samuel Tan

name: Piggy Bank 3.0
description:
We're back with a new and updated Piggy Bank from Whitehacks 2021. This time, I'm literally using haskell, which chatGPT tells me is a "memory safe" language. So anyways, that means I'm super secure right...

Hint: the challenge was compiled on Ubuntu 18.04

The flag will be in this format: WH2023{flag}

Author: Sean
